Parts.A: I can see, you received Derketo's Love. Talk to Lola, at the Pagoda of boundless lust, if you seek more knowledge.
Greetings sir, I am Tersina Acolyte of Derketo. Have you come to embrace Derketo as your true Lord and Master.
Parts.B: Yes, I wish to follow Derketo
Parts.C: Derk..what? No..I got better to do.

Parts.A:
Go out and seek Natala the Chosen. She will guide you to his embrace. To find her, solve the following riddle:

  Look to the well without waters free
  In the land harsh without glee
  Take not the leap of faith, devotee
  but look to the sky and come to me
Parts.B: Well? Waters? Glee? Uh..I'll find that somehow.
Parts.C: A riddle? That's one too much for me.

Parts.A:
Good! If you seek more of our cult, go to the Pagoda of Boundless Lust.
  There is one acolythe, who might have tasks for you!
